if __name__ == '__main__':
    while True:
        nums = raw_input()
        a = int(nums[0: nums.find(" ")])
        b = int(nums[nums.find(" ") + 1:])
        if ((a == 0) and (b == 0)):
            break
        else:
        	fibs=[1,1]
        	j=1
        	while fibs[j]<a:
        		fibs.append(fibs[j]+fibs[j-1])
        		j+=1
        	count=0
        	while fibs[j]<=b:
        		fibs.append(fibs[j]+fibs[j-1])
        		count+=1
        		j+=1
        	print count
